subject: Economy
question_en: What is the official language of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Hindi is the official language of Rajasthan.

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the largest industry in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में सर्वोत्र एंट्री क्या है?
explanation_en: The largest industry in Rajasthan is mining.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में सर्वोत्र इन्स्टोर का मान्यांना में मेंट्रकॉनिंग

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the national animal of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: The national animal of Rajasthan is the camel.

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the official language of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के मुखतीत्ता भाषा क्या है?
explanation_en: The official language of Rajasthan is Gujarati.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान के मुखतीत्ता भाषा क्या है?
राजस्थान के मुखतीत्ता भाषा क्या है?

subject: Economy
question_en: Who is the author of 'Rajasthan Razmik Parishad'?
explanation_en: Ram Lal Jain is the author of 'Rajasthan Razmik Parishad', while Anand Sagar is another renowned author.
explanation_hi: राम लाल जाइन राज़ वर सांचयाज सांचिन राज
